pile up.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to increase in quantity or amount, in a way that is difficult to manage
pile up.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: It wasn’t long before the debts were piling up.
The traffic starts piling up around this time.
The work has a tendency to pile up if I’m not careful.
pile up.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to arrange things in a pile
pile up.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: tiny doughnuts piled up in a dish
